subject: See what's new in Happy Elementor Addons (free) 😍
preview: Hello Happy Users,  Good day to all of you!  We are excited to announce that we have released the latest HappyAddons V2.7.0!  In this shipment, we have added some exclusive features.  You may be famil

full_threads.body:
<https://happyaddons.us16.list-manage.com/track/click?u=66e606cfe0af264974258f030&id=2f20174e67&e=3738dc6197>
Hello Happy Users,

Good day to all of you!

We are excited to announce that we have released the latest HappyAddons V2.7.0!

In this shipment, we have added some exclusive features.

You may be familiar with the Grid System of Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Figma. Now you will get the Grid Layout System within Elementor Page Builder. We have introduced a Happy Grid Layout System for you.

Here is the Documentation <https://happyaddons.us16.list-manage.com/track/click?u=66e606cfe0af264974258f030&id=18d5f8e3fb&e=3738dc6197>

Are you looking for a flexible way to insert links in sections or columns or other widgets?
We have added Happy Wrapper Link in this shipment. Now you can add custom links to anywhere you want.

Check out the Documentation <https://happyaddons.us16.list-manage.com/track/click?u=66e606cfe0af264974258f030&id=5c1d918329&e=3738dc6197>

Along with these features we have some new widgets,
- Twitter Feed widget <https://happyaddons.us16.list-manage.com/track/click?u=66e606cfe0af264974258f030&id=c1e0006286&e=3738dc6197>
- Bar Chart widget <https://happyaddons.us16.list-manage.com/track/click?u=66e606cfe0af264974258f030&id=2135c8b1cb&e=3738dc6197>
- Social Icons widget <https://happyaddons.us16.list-manage.com/track/click?u=66e606cfe0af264974258f030&id=8c9a847233&e=3738dc6197>

Not only that we have also enhanced some old stuff and squashed some bugs. Here is the full Changelog of HappyAddons Free (V2.7.0):

== 2.7.0 (20 February 2020) ==
- New: Twitter Feed widget
- New: Bar Chart widget
- New: Social Icons widget
- New: Grid Layer feature for designer
- New: Wrapper Link feature for section, column, and widget
- Update: Dynamic Tags support in Carousel widget
- Update: Dynamic Tags support in Dual Button widget
- Update: Dynamic Tags support in Logo Grid widget
- Update: Dynamic Tags support in News Ticker widget
- Update: Dynamic Tags support in Pricing Table widget
- Update: Dynamic Tags support in Skills widget
- Update: Dynamic Tags support in Slider widget
- Update: Dynamic Tags support in Testimonial widget
- Fix: Pricing Table widget PHP warning

So, update to the latest version automatically by clicking the 'Update' button in your website dashboard. Or, you can download the zip file and update manually from here.
Download Happy Elementor Addons
<https://happyaddons.us16.list-manage.com/track/click?u=66e606cfe0af264974258f030&id=234abc2ac0&e=3738dc6197>

Don't forget to join the HappyAddons Community <https://happyaddons.us16.list-manage.com/track/click?u=66e606cfe0af264974258f030&id=1c43ea5a13&e=3738dc6197> and help each other to make life easier 😇
___________________
